mapper.insert: INSERT INTO revenue(warehouse_id, member_id, revenue_category, amount, revenue_details, request_date, complete_date, payment_method, is_paid, del_flag) VALUES (#{warehouse.id}, #{member.id}, #{category}, #{amount}, #{revenueDetails}, #{requestDate}, #{completeDate}, #{paymentMethod}, #{isPaid}, #{delFlag})
mapper.update: UPDATE revenue SET warehouse_id=#{warehouse.id}, revenue_category=#{category}, amount=#{amount}, revenue_details=#{revenueDetails}, request_date=#{requestDate}, mod_date=now() WHERE revenue_id=#{id}
UPDATE revenue SET complete_date=#{completeDate}, payment_method=#{paymentMethod}, is_paid=#{isPaid}, mod_date=now() WHERE revenue_id=#{id}
UPDATE revenue SET del_flag=true, mod_date=now() WHERE revenue_id=#{id}
